cards.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2005/01/3602465_f4409b6f39.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/fraserspeirs/3602465/ "photo sharing") [Glasgow Cathedral and Royal Hospital](http://www.flickr.com/photos/fraserspeirs/3602465/), originally uploaded by [fspeirs](http://www.flickr.com/people/fraserspeirs/).
Not my work this, but a superb picture by [Fraser Spiers](http://fraserspeirs.livejournal.com/) of Glasgow. This picture made me really nostalgic for my childhood in Scotland. The whole [Western Necropolis photoset](http://www.flickr.com/photos/fraserspeirs/sets/90627/) is well worth a look.
